extracted_playbook.title: Use Trusted Resources for COVID-19 Information
extracted_playbook.description: For information regarding the COVID-19 pandemic, use trusted resources, such as the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC)â€™s COVID-19 Situation Summary.

extracted_playbook.title: Follow CISA Guidance for Defending Against COVID-19 Cyber Scams
extracted_playbook.description: Refer to CISA Insights and Alerts for guidance on defending against COVID-19 related cyber scams.

extracted_playbook.title: Follow NCSC Guidance on Spotting Suspicious Messages
extracted_playbook.description: Refer to NCSC guidance to help spot, understand, and deal with suspicious messages and emails.

extracted_playbook.title: Implement NCSC Guidance on Mitigating Malware and Ransomware
extracted_playbook.description: Follow NCSC guidance on mitigating malware and ransomware attacks.

extracted_playbook.title: Implement NCSC Guidance on Home Working
extracted_playbook.description: Follow NCSC guidance on home working to ensure security while working remotely.

extracted_playbook.title: Implement NCSC Guidance on End User Device Security
extracted_playbook.description: Follow NCSC guidance on securing end user devices.

extracted_playbook.title: Educate Users on Identifying Phishing Emails
extracted_playbook.description: Educate users on spotting phishing emails using NCSC's top tips: Authority, Urgency, Emotion, Scarcity.

extracted_playbook.title: Make it Difficult for Attackers to Reach Users
extracted_playbook.description: Implement measures to make it difficult for attackers to reach your users.

extracted_playbook.title: Help Users Identify and Report Phishing Emails
extracted_playbook.description: Help users identify and report suspected phishing emails using CISA Tips.

extracted_playbook.title: Protect Organization from Undetected Phishing Emails
extracted_playbook.description: Implement measures to protect your organization from the effects of undetected phishing emails.

extracted_playbook.title: Respond Quickly to Phishing Incidents
extracted_playbook.description: Plan and implement quick response strategies to phishing incidents.

extracted_playbook.title: Secure Online Meetings
extracted_playbook.description: Do not make meetings public. Require a meeting password or use the waiting room feature and control the admittance of guests.

extracted_playbook.title: Avoid Sharing Meeting Links Publicly
extracted_playbook.description: Do not share a link to a meeting on an unrestricted publicly available social media post. Provide the link directly to specific people.

extracted_playbook.title: Manage Screensharing Options
extracted_playbook.description: Change screensharing to 'Host Only' to prevent unauthorized access.

extracted_playbook.title: Ensure Updated Remote Access Applications
extracted_playbook.description: Ensure users are using the updated version of remote access/meeting applications.

extracted_playbook.title: Address Telework Policies for Security
extracted_playbook.description: Ensure telework policies address requirements for physical and information security.
